00057 using System;
00058 using System.Collections.Generic;
00059 
00060 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Interpolation.Algorithms
00061 {
00065     public class CubicSplineInterpolation :
00066         IInterpolationMethod
00067     {
00068         CubicHermiteSplineInterpolation _hermiteSpline;
00069 
00073         public
00074         CubicSplineInterpolation()
00075         {
00076             _hermiteSpline = new CubicHermiteSplineInterpolation();
00077         }
00078 
00083         public bool SupportsDifferentiation
00084         {
00085             get { return _hermiteSpline.SupportsDifferentiation; }
00086         }
00087 
00092         public bool SupportsIntegration
00093         {
00094             get { return _hermiteSpline.SupportsIntegration; }
00095         }
00096 
00102         public
00103         void
00104         Init(
00105             IList<double> t,
00106             IList<double> x
00107             )
00108         {
00109             Init(
00110                 t,
00111                 x,
00112                 SplineBoundaryCondition.SecondDerivative,
00113                 0.0,
00114                 SplineBoundaryCondition.SecondDerivative,
00115                 0.0
00116                 );
00117         }
00118 
00128         public
00129         void
00130         Init(
00131             IList<double> t,
00132             IList<double> x,
00133             SplineBoundaryCondition leftBoundaryCondition,
00134             double leftBoundary,
00135             SplineBoundaryCondition rightBoundaryCondition,
00136             double rightBoundary
00137             )
00138         {
00139             if(null == t)
00140             {
00141                 throw new ArgumentNullException("t");
00142             }
00143 
00144             if(null == x)
00145             {
00146                 throw new ArgumentNullException("x");
00147             }
00148 
00149             if(t.Count < 2)
00150             {
00151                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("t");
00152             }
00153 
00154             if(t.Count != x.Count)
00155             {
00156                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentVectorsSameLengths, "x");
00157             }
00158 
00159             int n = t.Count;
00160 
00161             double[] tt = new double[n];
00162             t.CopyTo(tt, 0);
00163             double[] xx = new double[n];
00164             x.CopyTo(xx, 0);
00165 
00166             Sorting.Sort(tt, xx);
00167 
00168             // normalize special cases
00169             if((n == 2)
00170                 && (leftBoundaryCondition == SplineBoundaryCondition.ParabolicallyTerminated)
00171                 && (rightBoundaryCondition == SplineBoundaryCondition.ParabolicallyTerminated))
00172             {
00173                 leftBoundaryCondition = SplineBoundaryCondition.SecondDerivative;
00174                 leftBoundary = 0d;
00175                 rightBoundaryCondition = SplineBoundaryCondition.SecondDerivative;
00176                 rightBoundary = 0d;
00177             }
00178 
00179             if(leftBoundaryCondition == SplineBoundaryCondition.Natural)
00180             {
00181                 leftBoundaryCondition = SplineBoundaryCondition.SecondDerivative;
00182                 leftBoundary = 0d;
00183             }
00184 
00185             if(rightBoundaryCondition == SplineBoundaryCondition.Natural)
00186             {
00187                 rightBoundaryCondition = SplineBoundaryCondition.SecondDerivative;
00188                 rightBoundary = 0d;
00189             }
00190 
00191             double[] a1 = new double[n];
00192             double[] a2 = new double[n];
00193             double[] a3 = new double[n];
00194             double[] b = new double[n];
00195 
00196             // Left Boundary
00197             switch(leftBoundaryCondition)
00198             {
00199                 case SplineBoundaryCondition.ParabolicallyTerminated:
00200                     a1[0] = 0;
00201                     a2[0] = 1;
00202                     a3[0] = 1;
00203                     b[0] = 2 * (xx[1] - xx[0]) / (tt[1] - tt[0]);
00204                     break;
00205                 case SplineBoundaryCondition.FirstDerivative:
00206                     a1[0] = 0;
00207                     a2[0] = 1;
00208                     a3[0] = 0;
00209                     b[0] = leftBoundary;
00210                     break;
00211                 case SplineBoundaryCondition.SecondDerivative:
00212                     a1[0] = 0;
00213                     a2[0] = 2;
00214                     a3[0] = 1;
00215                     b[0] = 3 * (xx[1] - xx[0]) / (tt[1] - tt[0]) - 0.5 * leftBoundary * (tt[1] - tt[0]);
00216                     break;
00217                 default:
00218                     throw new NotSupportedException(Properties.Resources.InvalidLeftBoundaryCondition);
00219             }
00220 
00221             // Central Conditions
00222             for(int i = 1; i < tt.Length - 1; i++)
00223             {
00224                 a1[i] = tt[i + 1] - tt[i];
00225                 a2[i] = 2 * (tt[i + 1] - tt[i - 1]);
00226                 a3[i] = tt[i] - tt[i - 1];
00227                 b[i] = 3 * (xx[i] - xx[i - 1]) / (tt[i] - tt[i - 1]) * (tt[i + 1] - tt[i]) + 3 * (xx[i + 1] - xx[i]) / (tt[i + 1] - tt[i]) * (tt[i] - tt[i - 1]);
00228             }
00229 
00230             // Right Boundary
00231             switch(rightBoundaryCondition)
00232             {
00233                 case SplineBoundaryCondition.ParabolicallyTerminated:
00234                     a1[n - 1] = 1;
00235                     a2[n - 1] = 1;
00236                     a3[n - 1] = 0;
00237                     b[n - 1] = 2 * (xx[n - 1] - xx[n - 2]) / (tt[n - 1] - tt[n - 2]);
00238                     break;
00239                 case SplineBoundaryCondition.FirstDerivative:
00240                     a1[n - 1] = 0;
00241                     a2[n - 1] = 1;
00242                     a3[n - 1] = 0;
00243                     b[n - 1] = rightBoundary;
00244                     break;
00245                 case SplineBoundaryCondition.SecondDerivative:
00246                     a1[n - 1] = 1;
00247                     a2[n - 1] = 2;
00248                     a3[n - 1] = 0;
00249                     b[n - 1] = 3 * (xx[n - 1] - xx[n - 2]) / (tt[n - 1] - tt[n - 2]) + 0.5 * rightBoundary * (tt[n - 1] - tt[n - 2]);
00250                     break;
00251                 default:
00252                     throw new NotSupportedException(Properties.Resources.InvalidRightBoundaryCondition);
00253             }
00254 
00255             // Build Spline
00256             double[] dd = SolveTridiagonal(a1, a2, a3, b);
00257             _hermiteSpline.InitInternal(tt, xx, dd);
00258         }
00259 
00265         public
00266         double
00267         Interpolate(
00268             double t
00269             )
00270         {
00271             return _hermiteSpline.Interpolate(t);
00272         }
00273 
00281         public
00282         double
00283         Differentiate(
00284             double t,
00285             out double first,
00286             out double second
00287             )
00288         {
00289             return _hermiteSpline.Differentiate(t, out first, out second);
00290         }
00291 
00298         public
00299         double
00300         Integrate(
00301             double t
00302             )
00303         {
00304             return _hermiteSpline.Integrate(t);
00305         }
00306 
00315         static
00316         double[]
00317         SolveTridiagonal(
00318             double[] a,
00319             double[] b,
00320             double[] c,
00321             double[] d
00322             )
00323         {
00324             double[] x = new double[a.Length];
00325 
00326             for(int k = 1; k < a.Length; k++)
00327             {
00328                 double t = a[k] / b[k - 1];
00329                 b[k] = b[k] - t * c[k - 1];
00330                 d[k] = d[k] - t * d[k - 1];
00331             }
00332 
00333             x[x.Length - 1] = d[d.Length - 1] / b[b.Length - 1];
00334             for(int k = x.Length - 2; k >= 0; k--)
00335             {
00336                 x[k] = (d[k] - c[k] * x[k + 1]) / b[k];
00337             }
00338 
00339             return x;
00340         }
00341     }
00342 }
